author: wrowe
msg: APR_FILEPATH_CANONICAL is senseless, so it's gone.
OTOH, APR_FILEPATH_NATIVE does make sense, so it's added (noop on unix).

author: wrowe
msg: Fix two minor bogosities, the case folding of directory names and my
first two bugs in this code.  Still needs some canonicalization and

author: wrowe
msg: Implement specific to win32, validate the actual root requested (to avoid
walking off into "Device Not Ready" nonsense) and tear apart and put back
together all [most?] of the nightmarish flavors of win32 file paths.
